mapper.insert: insert into db_smtaddress (ID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, COUNTRY, 'NAME', PHONE, MEMBERTYPE, POSTCODE, ADDRESSID, TRADEMANAGEID, ISDEFAULT, EMAIL, ISNEEDTOUPDATE, OPENFLAG, PROVINCE, COUNTY, CITY, AREA, STREET, STREETADDRESS) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{membertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trademanageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdefault,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isneedtoupdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{province,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{streetaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_smtaddress set SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBERTYPE = #{membertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSID = #{addressid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADEMANAGEID = #{trademanageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEFAULT = #{isdefault,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISNEEDTOUPDATE = #{isneedtoupdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, STREET = #{street,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, STREETADDRESS = #{streetaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, COUNTRY, 'NAME', PHONE, MEMBERTYPE, POSTCODE, ADDRESSID, TRADEMANAGEID, ISDEFAULT, EMAIL, ISNEEDTOUPDATE, OPENFLAG, PROVINCE, COUNTY, CITY, AREA, STREET, STREETADDRESS from db_smtaddress where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, COUNTRY, 'NAME', PHONE, MEMBERTYPE, POSTCODE, ADDRESSID, TRADEMANAGEID, ISDEFAULT, EMAIL, ISNEEDTOUPDATE, OPENFLAG, PROVINCE, COUNTY, CITY, AREA, STREET, STREETADDRESS from db_smtaddress
